body_html: To elaborate, I think I agree with you that BUILD_BINARIES is correctly doing what it says on the tin (and thus this issue is wrong), but I think this isn't actually what you want. If we're going to build all of these tests by default, might as well build the binaries by default too.
body_text: To elaborate, I think I agree with you that BUILD_BINARIES is correctly doing what it says on the tin (and thus this issue is wrong), but I think this isn't actually what you want. If we're going to build all of these tests by default, might as well build the binaries by default too.
body: To elaborate, I think I agree with you that `BUILD_BINARIES` is correctly doing what it says on the tin (and thus this issue is wrong), but I think this isn't actually what you want. If we're going to build all of these tests by default, might as well build the binaries by default too.
